name: Sprout (itch) (johnCavatelli)
description:
"Please help" cried the tree

"Why would I help you, you are so small and weak?" replied raccoon

"I beg you, I can provide for both of us if you help me."

"Okay" responded raccoon "how can I help"

"Gather the 3 orbs of life scattered through the forest, then I will be grown"

Sprout is a game about a raccoon helping a tree reach its full potential. It was made in <48 hours for the bonfire jam. AD to move, Space to jump.

Music by cinicMusic, sounds by zapsplat
